title: Be My Love Song
description: Madeline needs a hero. She hires an architect, Weston, to save Windswept and an escort to convince her meddlesome sister she has a boyfriend. Unfortunately, she gets them confused. Weston, like most heroes, will save the day. What heâ€™s not expecting is to fall hopelessly in love.*Content adult language and situations.18+ only*
author: Sable Hunter
